findings.title: A01.Redundant Code Removal
findings.description: The `_mint()` routine has an unnecessary redundancy that can be safely removed, specifically the `onlyOwner` modifier (line 53) is redundant since the `_mint()` routine is defined as an internal function.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Roles
findings.description: In `LuckyToken`, there is a privileged `_owner` that plays a critical role, i.e., minting additional tokens into circulation.
